column2: "Hey, I have one question and you better answer it directly. Where's that masked guy?"
"Tch, that look on your face. You really don't know do you? How boring."
"Listen, <%me> if you get a chance draw him to you and bring him to me. Got that?"
"You understand right? That's the only plaything I've had my eyes on for a while."
"Well, there's no reason to rush it. When I finally get to fight him it will feel that much better for waiting."
"Though, if you get stronger before then, I wouldn't mind playing with you first."
